p:
Although biosynthesized gold nanoparticles did not display a better cytotoxic effect than their precursors, exhibiting only residual cytotoxicity from BRP active compounds, they still constitute a great advantage compared with gold nanoparticles synthetized by chemical methods. El Domany et al.
88 described that biosynthesized AuNPs were more cytotoxic than chemically synthesized AuNPs in studies with PC-3, HCT116, and HepG2 tumor cells. Besides, the easy modification of the allows their association with other antitumor drugs and molecules that can target specifics cells, such as cancer cells
89 . Researchers have been reported the beneficial effects of the combination between anticancer agents and polyphenols
90, 91 , as well as compounds found in BRP
92â€“ 94 . Qiao et al.
95 showed that green tea catechins associated with antitumor drugs are more effective than monotherapy.
